title: Ticket #6908: Migrate the manual to Read the Docs
description:
The current HTCondor manual is built on ancient technology, is difficult to update, even more difficult to build, and looks awful. We want to move the manual into a modern framework, namely Sphinx, and host it on Read the Docs.

The first part of this project called "Read the Docs" (and the goal of this ticket) is to do a full migration of current manual into reStructuredText format, get it hosted on Read the Docs, and integrate it into our release workflow. The vast majority of this work can be automated with scripts, but some manual tidy up will be required to make the new pages look right.

This does not however solve the problem that our manual is bloated, badly organized, poorly written and not user-friendly. A later project called "Fix the Docs" will deal with these (far more complicated) problems in a separate ticket.
derived_tickets:
#6953   Migrate existing Python bindings docs
#7077   Fix the Docs
